result.title: HELP REQUIRED IN SPOJ K-QUERY
result.content: Hi everyone,I have been trying this question SPOJ K-QUERYfor 2 days now.After unsuccessful attempts to come up with logic,I finally referred Blogs available online.But I am neither getting head nor tail of the logic. Can someone please tell me the formation of fenwick/segment tree that is used(especially the technique used).It will be a great help.Please! Thanks in advance.
